description.value:
This elegant dagger has a blade forged from silvered steel that seems to shimmer with moonlight. The hilt is wrapped in white leather, and a small moonstone is set in the pommel.

Properties: This dagger is a +1 magic weapon. When you hit an undead creature with this weapon, it deals an additional 1d4 radiant damage. The blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. You can use a bonus action to toggle this light on or off.

Attunement: Requires attunement
